basic.description: A study of the relationships between literary texts written in English, from classics to contemporary popular fiction, and their adaptations in a range of media, comprising close analysis, historical and cultural investigation into national and transnational formulations of adaptation, and discussion of the processes and theories of adaptation.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Literature on Screen and Stage

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in ENGL100.
